img_above_text:
![Wukong Tiger 2.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/9/96/Wukong_Tiger_2.jpg)
Be sure to stop and look to the right as you begin to climb the steps, and you’ll find an alcove with a shining chest that holds a **Blood of the Iron Bull** , 1 **Small Piece of Gold** , and 4 **Tiny Piece of Gold**.
img_below_text:
Keep heading up, and look left before reaching the top of the stairs. This time, you’ll find a **Meditation Spot** around the corner at the foot of a large tiger statue, and resting at it will award you a free Spark Skill Point.
The Sculpture, Crouching Tiger Temple Meditation Spot
summary_promot:
You are shown an image extracted from a video game walkthrough or guide.


        
        Context:
        - Preceding Text: "![Wukong Tiger 2.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/9/96/Wukong_Tiger_2.jpg)
Be sure to stop and look to the right as you begin to climb the steps, and you’ll find an alcove with a shining chest that holds a **Blood of the Iron Bull** , 1 **Small Piece of Gold** , and 4 **Tiny Piece of Gold**."
        - Following Text: "Keep heading up, and look left before reaching the top of the stairs. This time, you’ll find a **Meditation Spot** around the corner at the foot of a large tiger statue, and resting at it will award you a free Spark Skill Point.
The Sculpture, Crouching Tiger Temple Meditation Spot"

        Your task:
        1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
        2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.
        3. Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.
img_summary: The image depicts a scene from the video game *Black Myth: Wukong*, showing the protagonist approaching a glowing chest marked with a red indicator. The chest is located near a large tiger statue in a temple-like environment. Based on the preceding text, the chest contains valuable items, including **Blood of the Iron Bull**, **Small Piece of Gold**, and **Tiny Piece of Gold**, which players can collect. The following text suggests that further exploration leads to a **Meditation Spot** near the tiger statue, offering a reward of a Spark Skill Point. The image highlights a key loot location and serves as a guide for progressing through this area.
